The Very Best in
Hygienic Wall Cladding

KarEbinR is an exciting new high-quality PVC hygienic wall cladding system. The product range offers designers a large colour palette that includes unique and popular colour choices which, can add style and hygiene for a variety of robust built-for purpose solutions

Our Trade Prices
Previous Next

KarEbinR is a specialist supplier to industry for ‘hygienic’ decorative PVC products

Many of the products are unique and can add style, safety and hygiene for a variety of robust built-for-purpose solutions.

The material can be used in area types that are wet, secure or hygienic as well as a whole host of limitless possibilities.

The results are strong, robust and hygienic finish to any desired space.

Contact Us

What we do

Our Services

KarEbinR are a national supplier of hygienic wall cladding. We supply our ‘exclusive’ high quality KarEbinR range. A trade only white and grey sheet range, DigEfex (digitally printed PVC), wall protection and tile effect PVC sheet ranges
